attributes.action: To make it law if you own a swimming pool. Fence it in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Time to make our voices heard. There are to many needless deaths these days with unfenced swimming pools. We believe the time has now come to make these pools safe.To many children and animals lives (dogs mainly) are being taken all too soon through irresponsible owners. Let us not wait for the next tragedy to happen. Make your voice heard now. Please take a minute and sign this petition make a difference save a life. Thank You

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "To make it law if you own a swimming pool. Fence it in."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13116.asp

Prime Minister's Office
